scripts.js:concat: concat -o public/bundle.js libs/templater.js source/locales/ru.js source/main.template.js source/render-client.js
scripts.js:bundle: npm run js:concat && npm run js:uglify
scripts.css:concat: concat -o public/prebundle.css source/styles/index.css source/styles/content.css source/styles/sidebar.css source/styles/icons.css source/styles/media.css
scripts.css:bundle: npm run css:concat && npm run css:uglify && rm public/prebundle.css
scripts.clear:public: rm -f public/bundle.css && rm -f public/bundle.js && rm -f public/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clear:dist && npm run css:bundle && node source/render-server.js
scripts.start: npm run clear:public && npm run css:bundle && npm run js:bundle && npm run move:html
